Session start time as the default starting time for orders

Super, CONFIGURATION, UseCaseStartingTime = 0

Determines the default starting time of standard orders added during a session. Standard orders are added using the Add Item command on the shortcut (displayed by right-clicking a heading on the flowsheet) is the start of the session.

When this parameter is active, the Starting Time control in the order dialog box displays the starting time of the session (in hours, minutes and seconds). When it is disabled, the default starting for standard orders is the exact time they are added (in hours, minutes and seconds).

Values

0 = Time order is added

1 = Starting time of the session

Related parameter

Default starting time for orders added during a session
